title: Egyptian woman carries her husband to vote
text:
Egyptian woman carries her husband to vote 12:36pm BST - 01:20 
An Egyptian wife carries her disabled husband to vote on the last day of Egypt's presidential elections. Zahra Mackaoui reports   
An Egyptian wife carries her disabled husband to vote on the last day of Egypt's presidential elections. Zahra Mackaoui reports  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/28/egyptian-woman-carries-her-husband-to-vo?videoId=412813639&videoChannel=13422
